switch.name: Left fuel pump
switch.test: propulsion/fuel-selector NE 0 propulsion/fuel-pump NE 1 propulsion/tank[0]/contents-lbs LE 0 propulsion/tank[2]/contents-lbs GE 0.8

switch.name: Right fuel pump
switch.test: propulsion/fuel-selector NE 1 propulsion/fuel-pump NE 1 propulsion/tank[1]/contents-lbs LE 0 propulsion/tank[2]/contents-lbs GE 0.8

switch.name: Left tank with engine
switch.test: propulsion/fuel-selector NE 0 propulsion/engine/engine-rpm LE 500 propulsion/tank[0]/contents-lbs LE 0 propulsion/tank[2]/contents-lbs GE 0.8 propulsion/tank[2]/contents-lbs LE 0.1

switch.name: Right tank with engine
switch.test: propulsion/fuel-selector NE 1 propulsion/engine/engine-rpm LE 500 propulsion/tank[1]/contents-lbs LE 0 propulsion/tank[2]/contents-lbs GE 0.8 propulsion/tank[2]/contents-lbs LE 0.1
